com.mashery.trafficmanager.model.core

Interface HostRequestConfiguration


  • public interface HostRequestConfiguration
    Endpoint configuration for target requests.
    Restriction
    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.
    Restriction
    This interface is not intended to be extended by clients.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAdditionalQueryString()
      Returns the optional query string to add to target request URI
      HostRequestCredentials getAPICredentials()
      Returns the optional substitute API credentials for target request.
      HostRequestAuthentication getAuthentication()
      Returns the optional authentication configuration for target request.
      int getConnectTimeout()
      Returns the maximum time (in seconds) allowed for connecting to target server.
      int getRedirectLimit()
      Returns the maximum number of redirects to follow.
      int getResponseTimeout()
      Returns the maximum time (in seconds) allowed for the response from target server.
      HostRequestScheme getScheme()
      Returns the target request scheme override.
      List<HostServer> getServers()
      Returns an array of one or more servers that the target request should be made to.

    • Method Detail

      • getConnectTimeout

        int getConnectTimeout()
        Returns the maximum time (in seconds) allowed for connecting to target server.
        Returns:
        maximum time (in seconds) allowed for connecting to target server

      • getAdditionalQueryString

        String getAdditionalQueryString()
        Returns the optional query string to add to target request URI
        Returns:
        query string to add to target request URI

      • getAPICredentials

        HostRequestCredentials getAPICredentials()
        Returns the optional substitute API credentials for target request.
        Returns:
        substitute API credentials for target request

      • getAuthentication

        HostRequestAuthentication getAuthentication()
        Returns the optional authentication configuration for target request.
        Returns:
        authentication configuration for target request

      • getRedirectLimit

        int getRedirectLimit()
        Returns the maximum number of redirects to follow.
        Returns:
        maximum number of redirects to follow

      • getResponseTimeout

        int getResponseTimeout()
        Returns the maximum time (in seconds) allowed for the response from target server.
        Returns:
        maximum time (in seconds) allowed for the response from target server.

      • getScheme

        HostRequestScheme getScheme()
        Returns the target request scheme override. A null value indicates that the inbound request's scheme should be used.
        Returns:
        target request scheme override

      • getServers

        List<HostServer> getServers()
        Returns an array of one or more servers that the target request should be made to. Each entry consists of the target server's public hostname or IP address optionally followed by port. E.g., www.example.com:8080, or 62.52.141.210.
        Returns:
        list of servers to which to send the target request
